Treatments_Section.SECTION_TITLE: Different types of treatments for a better quality of life

TREATMENTS.name: Chelation Therapy
TREATMENTS.description: Administering intravenous EDTA to treat diseases caused by calcium deposits and heavy metals in the arteries.

TREATMENTS.name: Ozone Therapy
TREATMENTS.description: Applying therapeutic ozone with a medicinal generator to treat chronic and degenerative diseases, especially circulatory, digestive, and osteoarticular problems.

TREATMENTS.name: Intravenous Vitamin Therapy
TREATMENTS.description: Administering high concentrations of vitamins and minerals intravenously to improve the overall functioning of the body.

TREATMENTS.name: Neural Therapy
TREATMENTS.description: Neural Therapy treats painful conditions caused by disorders in the body's electrical system, specifically interference fields.

TREATMENTS.name: Vitamin C Infusion
TREATMENTS.description: High-dose intravenous vitamin C therapy is an excellent anti-inflammatory for chronic pathologies of the immune system, infections, and cancer.

TREATMENTS.name: Integrative Oncology
TREATMENTS.description: In patients undergoing chemotherapy and radiotherapy, a programmed detoxification is combined with antioxidants and vitamins to eliminate chemicals, care for the immune system, and reduce physical and emotional side effects.

TREATMENTS.name: Autologous Immunotherapy
TREATMENTS.description: Autologous immunotherapy treats cancer and autoimmune diseases by activating the patient's immune system cells.

TREATMENTS.name: Orthomolecular Medicine
TREATMENTS.description: It is part of cellular rehabilitation medicine to restore the body's biochemical balance. Nutrients and other essential elements act as an integrated system; diseases indicate imbalances.

Why_Choose_Us.TITLE: Biological Medicine for a Full Life
Why_Choose_Us.DESCRIPTION: Biological medicine opens new possibilities for your health. We are committed to guiding you towards a healthier and fuller life.
